intro.title: Hello
intro.text: My name is Alexey, I'm a junior frontend developer, currently focusing on Vue.js

about.title: About me
about.firstText: I create crossbrowser responsive HTML page layouts and make it live using native JavaScript or Vue.js framework.
about.secondText: I can help you with converting website design to HTML templates, developing frontend for your project and optimizing existing code.
about.thirdText: These skills help me along the way:
about.fourthText: All the things: responsive, adaptive, mobile-first.
about.fifthText: By default support Edge and modern version of Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera, Safari.
about.sixthText: All that depends on me must works fast. Css-sprites, svg symbols, webp pictures, responsive images, efficient code, optimization and minification. Clean markup reach 90+ on Google Tests.
about.seventhText: I have some backend programming experience and think as a backend programmer will think when working with my code.
about.place: State University of Humanities and Technology, Orekhovo-Zuyevo

pageFooter.title: Contacts
